appearance.description: Graceful young woman with long flowing black hair and intensely bright cyan eyes. Her ether aura is more visibly radiant than her twin's.
appearance.face: Delicate, noble features with intensely bright cyan eyes
appearance.eyes: Bright cyan (more intense glow than Aeron)
appearance.hair: Long, flowing black, floats with ether use, cyan luminescence
appearance.clothing: Simple villager clothes, elegant when available

combat.fightingStyle: Graceful, precise, complementary synergy with Aeron
combat.techniques: Enhanced ether absorption, ranged ether attacks
combat.weaknesses: Physically less durable, overreliance on ether

personality.morals: Compassionate, strategic, wise beyond her years
personality.weaknesses: Can overthink situations, emotional bond to Aeron
personality.motivations: Understand their true nature, protect Aeron, master ether
personality.fears: Being separated from Aeron, losing control of their powers
personality.dreams: Find their family, understand the truth of the Déos

skills.naturalTalents: Intense ether absorption, twin synergy, exceptional intellect

connections.family: Malvin & Elise Bulon (adoptive parents), Marie (adoptive sister), Aeron (twin brother, MC)

background.childhood: Daughter of King Darian and Queen Lysandra. Fled Maria as infant with twin Aeron under mother's sacrifice
background.importantEvents: Mother's death protecting the twins, exile to Teria, growing up human
background.quests: Discovering their origins with Aeron, investigating Cadfael's resistance

narrative.storyArc: Twin heroine, quest for identity and power mastery
narrative.futureDevelopment: Intellectual and magical maturation, synergy with Aeron
